alert.note: Alert for Arenac; Gladwin (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 03 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Michigan, including the following counties, Arenac and Gladwin. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alger, Gladwin, Standish, Au Gres, Sterling, Maple Ridge, Beaverton, Omer, Twining, Turner, Rhodes, Wooden Shoe Village and Winegars. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
